login.onSuccess: Successful! You will be redirected soon...
login.onBadRequest: The server denied the request. Please check your inputs and try again.
login.onInvalidPassword: The entered password is invalid. Please check your inputs and try again.
login.onRequestError: There has been an error while attempting to connect to the server. Please check your connection and try again.
login.onServerError: The sever had trouble responding to your request. Please check your inputs and try again...
login.onUserNotFound: The username you entered does not exist. Please check your inputs or create a new account.

register.onBadRequest: The server denied the request. Please check your inputs and try again.
register.onRequestError: There has been an error while attempting to connect to the server. Please check your connection and try again.
register.onServerError: The sever had trouble responding to your request. Please check your inputs and try again...
register.onUsernameTaken: The username you entered is already taken. Please use a different one.
register.onPasswordsDontMatch: The passwords you entered don't match.
register.onToSNotAccepted: Sorry, but if you want to use this App you need to accept the ToS and Privacy Policy.
register.onSuccess: Your account was created! You will be redirected to the login within 5 seconds!

account.onError: Error connecting to the server. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
